value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|We've got reports that more Brave
Heroes have appeared thanks to
another rite... It's time we investigate.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, I just love this. Another chance to
make some wonderful friends!$k$p$Sbs4000|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Alfonse, what's wrong? Are you even
listening?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|This report says that one of the
Heroes is... Well, again, it's nobody I
could possibly have anticipated.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What? You don't mean—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm afraid so.$k$pIt's Loki.$k$p

$WmMPID_ロキ味方,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|And who might you be, my dear?$k$p$WmMPID_インバース,ch04_31_Inverse_F_Normal,Face|My name is Aversa. It's a pleasure
to meet you.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ味方,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|No, dear, the pleasure is all mine.
It's a thrill to meet someone as
bewitching as you.$k$p$WmMPID_インバース,ch04_31_Inverse_F_Normal,Face|I understand what you mean very
well. You've led many on a merry
chase, haven't you?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ味方,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Hee-hee. We make quite the pair,
don't we? We're practically twins.$k$p$WmMPID_インバース,ch04_31_Inverse_F_Normal,Face|Well...I wouldn't go that far, I think.
We may bear some superficial
similarities, but...$k$pYou're no human.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ味方,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, dear. Whatever would make you
say that?$k$p$WmMPID_インバース,ch04_31_Inverse_F_Normal,Face|Talking to you freezes my very spine.
It's not unlike how I felt in the
presence of Grima.$k$pYou're terrifying. I can tell that you
would devour me if I showed the
slightest weakness.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ味方,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Hee-hee. I see. That shouldn't stop
us from having a little fun, though,
should it?$k$pBut, oh—they're already here. I can
see you, $Nu!$k$pIt's funny how the Order of Heroes
always interrupts right when things
start to get interesting.$k$pIf you had to pick between us, tell
me...who would you choose? I'll
hear your answer after the fight!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_インバース,ch04_31_Inverse_F_Normal,Face|What a forceful display! The battle
isn't over just yet, however...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ味方,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Hey, you! Where do you think you're
going without me?$k$p$Sbs150|
